days_averaged = 14

def difference(raw_data):
    data = [max(0, raw_data[i][1] - raw_data[i-1][1]) for i in range(1, len(raw_data))]
    for i in range(1, len(raw_data)):
        raw_data[i][1] = data[i-1]
    return raw_data[1:]

def moving_average(data, n):
    output = []
    for i in range(len(data)):
        start = max(0, i - n)
        total = sum(data[start:i+1])
        output.append(total / (i - start + 1))
    return output

def process_data(data, n):
    data = difference(data)
    dates = [data[i][0] for i in range(len(data))]
    vals = moving_average([data[i][1] for i in range(len(data))], n)
    return [[dates[i], vals[i]] for i in range(len(dates))]

@onstart()
def start(self):
    self.visible = False

@nb.on_message('update charts')
def update_chart(self, x, y):
    lat = nb.google_maps.get_latitude_from_y(y)
    long = nb.google_maps.get_longitude_from_x(x)
    country = nb.geolocation.country(lat, long)
    state = nb.geolocation.state(lat, long)
    
    options = {
        'isTimeSeries': True,
        'timeInputFormat': '%m/%d/%Y',
        'timeDisplayFormat': '%m/%d',
        'types': ['boxes'],
        'height': stage.height / 2,
        'width': stage.width,
    }
    
    cases = None
    if country == 'United States':
        cases = process_data(nb.covid19.get_confirmed_counts('US', state), days_averaged)
        options['title'] = f'Number of New Daily COVID-19 Cases in {state} (averaged over {days_averaged} days)'
    else:
        cases = process_data(nb.covid19.get_confirmed_counts(country), days_averaged)
        options['title'] = f'Number of New Daily COVID-19 Cases in {country} (averaged over {days_averaged} days)'
    
    self.pos = (0, stage.height / 4)
    self.costume = nb.chart.draw([cases], options)
    self.visible = True
